code: import React from'react';import'./ProgressBar.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProgressBar=_ref=>{let{currentStep,totalSteps}=_ref;const progress=(currentStep+1)/totalSteps*100;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"progress-bar-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-bar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"progress-fill",style:{width:`${progress}%`}})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"progress-text",children:[Math.round(progress),"%"]})]});};export default ProgressBar;
